sentences.sContent: The team believes one of the most important factors is hydration - the way skin collects and retains moisture.
sentences.sContent_eng: The team believes one of the most important factors is hydration - the way skin collects and retains moisture.
sentences.sCn: 科研人员称，其中最重要的因素是水合，指皮肤吸收水分、保持湿度的过程。

sentences.sContent: Previous experiments and simulations, however, indicated that the free energy of hydration did not match this predicted linear trend.
sentences.sContent_eng: Previous experiments and simulations, however, indicated that the free energy of hydration did not match this predicted linear trend.
sentences.sCn: 然而，过去的研究和模拟表明，烷烃的水化自由能并不符合预计的线性变化趋势。

words.tran: 与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）
